channel.title: The Scott Mendell Houston Area Finer Homes Real Estate Video Series
channel.description:
Real Estate Video Tours from the Houston, Texas Region Presented by Scott Mendell of Coldwell Banker United, Realtors.

For more information, contact Scott Mendell by phone at 281-433-7621, by email at Scott@HoustonAReaFinerHomes.com , or visit him online at www.HoustonAreaFinerHomes.com today.

This real estate video tour feed is presented by www.AgentCasts.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Scott Mendell Houston Area Finer Homes Real Estate Video Series. For more information, contact Scott Mendell by phone at 281-433-7621, by email at Scott@HoustonAReaFinerHomes.com , or visit him online at www.HoustonAreaFinerHomes.com today.
channel.itunes:summary:
Real Estate Video Tours from the Houston, Texas Region Presented by Scott Mendell of Coldwell Banker United, Realtors.
Our values:
-- HONESTY, INTEGRITY and UNPARALLELED SERVICE -- Three Strong Ideals.... One Powerful Commitment. Okay, here is more than you ever wanted to know about me! I am an Accredited Real Estate Professional, Quality Service Certified, ePro certified, certified Internet marketing and promotion specialist, a member of the Real Estate Buyers Agent Council, a certified Mortgage Real Estate Professional as well as a certified Senior Housing Specialist. I also have a certification as a mortgage loan officer. My Family and I have lived in and served the greater Houston area since 1968. I serve on both the MBA council of Houston and on the Houston World Affairs Council. My favorite volunteer work though has to be my work with the Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo.
channel.itunes:keywords: scott mendell,houston,texas,real estate,coldwell banker united realtors,Harris County,Fort Bend County,Galleria,homes,houses,for sale,property
